## 2025 Edition

The Ph.D. in Economics of Sapienza University is pleased to announce the **5th Sailing the Macro Workshop** that will be held in September 2025.

The complete program will be made available after the paper acceptance process has been completed. 

### Important Dates

- **Paper Submission Deadline**: May 5, 2025
- **Notification of Acceptance**: May 30, 2025
- **Program Publication**: June 15, 2025
- **Workshop Dates**: September 5-7, 2025

:::
